name: Space Biker: 3D Top-Down Shooter
description:
Space is a very dangerous place, especially with hordes of monsters and without your space bike...

However, some situations cannot be avoided, so turn each enemy into just a memory and a pool of blood on the ground. This will help you 7 types of weapons and the ability to personalize them by opening skins. Have fun in various modes, trying to surpass your previous result, complete tasks.

Peculiarities:

gif made on mobile version

• Meat gameplay

• Hours of play with over 120 levels and 3 modes

• Dynamic music, good soundtrack

• 7 types of weapons, 21 skins for it

• There is never too much blood

• Unique atmosphere!

Inspired by classics such as: Alien Shooter and Crimsonland



video made on mobile version

I am a beginner indie developer, this is my 2nd project and I want to share it with you so that you can fairly evaluate my game.

Open to criticism, new ideas and improvements

Version: 0.1
